price: 74. Nabii Yuusuf maray keela gurrusa Nabii Yuusuf toobokok sin madqal garqi digaala macaay isin nanu garaaqa hinnino ittaanamal dirab leela tekkeenik keenik iyye.
arabic: قَالُواْ فَمَا جَزَٰٓؤُهُۥٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ كَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū famā jazāuhu in kuntum kādhibīna
